actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the importation into the United States of meat or meat products from livestock slaughtered or handled in connection with slaughter by other than humane methods.

summary.text: Prohibits the importation into the United States of meat or meat products from livestock slaughtered or handled in connection with slaughter by other than humane methods.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the importation into the United States of meat or meat products from livestock slaughtered or handled in connection with slaughter by other than humane methods.
